title.full: Watchmen The End is Nigh Part 2

description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) It’s June 1977, and any day now the passage of the Keene Act will outlaw all masked vigilantes not sanctioned by the government. Rorschach has uncovered a mysterious missing person’s case together with the help of Nite Owl the pair has set out to find the young girl. Their search takes them deep into the depraved, sleazy corners of the city and eventually face-to-face with the mysterious Twilight Lady. The seedy underbelly of New York beckons… will you take the call?   This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Experience brutal combat as you clean up the streets with the Watchmen’s unlawful brand of justice in this adventure, set before the events of the film.
